main event: Three round white objects were observed in the sky by a civilian on 26 June 1957.
interesting points: The objects were described as circular and slightly elongated as they disappeared,They were reported to be the size of baseballs and white silverish in color,One object flashed a red light once as it trailed the other two,The sighting lasted for about 3 to 5 minutes and occurred around dusk,The objects moved from west to east in a straight flight path and appeared to climb before disappearing into a dark cloud.
witness description: One witness is a 24-year-old housewife from Port Vue, Pennsylvania.
